blog.title: despite everything, it's still you
blog.description: hi i'm sarah and i have too many interests and too little time || she/her

tags: i also hate that ppl are getting so mad at ppl for speculating on phan and stuff
this is NOT one of those posts
summary: i love love love all the support dan is getting and idc if people want to speculate about his relationship with phil but!! don't...
body: i love love love all the support dan is getting and idc if people want to speculate about his relationship with phil but!! don’t call them boyfriends! i have seen that happening a lot and it’s just really frustrating bc he deliberately didn’t clarify their current status and some people are just assuming.

reblog.comment: i love love love all the support dan is getting and idc if people want to speculate about his relationship with phil but!! don’t call them boyfriends! i have seen that happening a lot and it’s just really frustrating bc he deliberately didn’t clarify their current status and some people are just assuming.

trail.content_raw: i love love love all the support dan is getting and idc if people want to speculate about his relationship with phil but!! don’t call them boyfriends! i have seen that happening a lot and it’s just really frustrating bc he deliberately didn’t clarify their current status and some people are just assuming.
trail.content: i love love love all the support dan is getting and idc if people want to speculate about his relationship with phil but!! don’t call them boyfriends! i have seen that happening a lot and it’s just really frustrating bc he deliberately didn’t clarify their current status and some people are just assuming.

tags: lemme say many relationships didn't cope well with too small flats and constant exposure
summary: I know we were all like 'they booked two rooms to mask they are a couple' and even if I think this is true to some degree I also...
body: I know we were all like ‘they booked two rooms to mask they are a couple’ and even if I think this is true to some degree I also think it’s really smart. They also had their own room in their flats all those years and it was a good choice. Even if one is a couple and loves to spend every minute with each other there sometimes is a moment when you are just sick of human interaction in general and need a little bit of me time (not that kind you perv). I am still sure they spend most nights with each other. It’s just healthy to be able to be alone for a bit.

blog.name: sweetiednp
blog.description: chloe/17

summary: I wonder if it's okay that I joined the phandom just recently? Many people say stuff like "you're not valid if you start...
question: I wonder if it's okay that I joined the phandom just recently? Many people say stuff like "you're not valid if you start watching dnp just because dan has come out" but for me it's just that even though I knew about them a while ago I was in too many fandoms and I thought "it's too late now" and I wasn't sure if I would be able to catch up but now that I'm not active anywhere I decided to watch his latest video and from there I kind of watched like a 100 more and I'm so deep, there's no quiting
answer:
it’s completely valid that u are just now getting in deep with dnp! as long as you are enjoying their content you are welcome here


also i felt “there’s no quitting”

reblog.comment:
it’s completely valid that u are just now getting in deep with dnp! as long as you are enjoying their content you are welcome here

blog.name: shipsarefundontoverdoem
blog.title: Hi Idk What I'm Doing Anymore
blog.description: Basically I've had this account for like 4 years now, I reblog a lot of things and give opinions. Got questions pm me, though I doubt anyone wants to. :)

tags: thanks for coming to my ted talk
body:
Please Don’t be Ashamed

Ok, so I know Dan’s video wasn’t only about the relationship he has with Phil but I’m just here to say that it’s ok to ship them, they have both stated theyre fine with it, they’ve written fanfics themselves, and Dan’s said he appreciates the creativity that comes from it. I’ve noticed a lot of people deleting fics because they’re ashamed but they don’t have to be. You can do what you want as long as it’s respectful, violation of privacy is harrasment, being proud of what they’ve done and cheering from the side lines is ok. Continue to be you, even if the majority thinks you’re stupid and remember to be respectful. 💚🏳️‍🌈

reblog.comment:
